events.title: Community Cleanup Day
events.description: Join us for a day of cleaning up our neighborhood parks and streets. Let's work together to keep our community clean and beautiful!

events.title: Community Garden Workshop
events.description: Learn how to start your own community garden and grow fresh produce in your neighborhood. Experienced gardeners will provide tips and guidance.

events.title: Neighborhood BBQ Party
events.description: Join us for a fun-filled BBQ party with delicious food, music, games, and activities for the whole family. Let's celebrate our community spirit!
